Visit the past or future: You could use your teleportation ability to visit different time periods, such as ancient Egypt or the future, and witness history firsthand.
Help with disaster relief: You could instantly teleport to disaster-stricken areas and provide aid and supplies to those in need.
Assist in scientific research: You could teleport to remote locations or even outer space to collect samples or conduct experiments.
Assist in law enforcement: You could teleport to crime scenes or locations of missing persons to help solve crimes and locate missing people.
Teleport to different dimensions: You could explore different dimensions and universes, and potentially discover new forms of life or technologies.
